function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Incomplete or ineffective implementation of mitigation measures","Impact":"Uncontrolled spread of contagious diseases, leading to increased cases and deaths","Mitigation":"Clear communication, enforcement of measures, and public education on the importance of compliance","Technologies":"Public health campaigns, digital tools for tracking compliance","People":"General public, policymakers, public health officials","Owner":"Policymakers, public health authorities, community leaders"},{"Description":"Public non-compliance with mitigation measures","Impact":"Prolonged epidemic, increased number of deaths, overwhelmed healthcare system","Mitigation":"Clear communication, incentives for compliance, enforcement of measures, public education on the importance of compliance","Technologies":"Public health campaigns, digital tools for tracking compliance","People":"General public, policymakers, public health officials","Owner":"Policymakers, public health authorities, community leaders"},{"Description":"Lack of coordination and consistency in mitigation measures across states","Impact":"Uneven containment of the epidemic, potential for cross-border transmission, confusion and lack of clarity for the public","Mitigation":"Standardized guidelines, collaboration between states, clear communication from central authorities","Technologies":"Digital platforms for sharing data and guidelines, communication tools for stakeholders","People":"Public, policymakers, state authorities","Owner":"Central health authorities, policymakers"}]}
